name: IslamQA - Scholarly Fatwas & Answers
description: Major Islamic Q&A website supervised by Sheikh Muhammad Salih al-Munajjid. Provides detailed scholarly answers (fatwas) on Islamic jurisprudence, beliefs, and practice. Answers are based on Quran, Sunnah, and scholarly consensus.

categories.name: Jurisprudence (Fiqh)
categories.description: Questions about Islamic law - prayer, fasting, zakat, hajj, transactions

categories.name: Beliefs (Aqeedah)
categories.description: Questions about Islamic creed and beliefs

categories.name: Quran Interpretation
categories.description: Questions about meanings and interpretations of Quranic verses

categories.name: Hadith Sciences
categories.description: Questions about hadith authenticity, meanings, and applications

categories.name: Manners & Ethics
categories.description: Questions about Islamic etiquette and moral conduct

categories.name: Women's Issues
categories.description: Questions specifically related to Muslim women

search.resultLinkSelector: a.result-title, a[href*='/answers/'], h2 a, h3 a
search.searchTips: Search in English for English answers. Use specific Islamic terms (e.g., 'wudu', 'zakat') for better results. Question numbers can be searched directly.

contentPage.description: Content pages are individual fatwas/answers, identified by /answers/{question-number} path. Available in multiple languages.

extraction.contentNotes: IslamQA answers are comprehensive fatwas that cite evidence from Quran and Hadith. The answers follow Sunni orthodox methodology (primarily Hanbali school). Each answer includes the question, detailed response with evidence, and often a summary. References to Quranic verses and hadith within the text should be extracted.

aiNotes: IslamQA.info is a trusted Sunni scholarly source following the Hanbali madhab. When citing, use the question number (e.g., 'IslamQA #12345'). Answers contain embedded Quran and hadith references that should be extracted. The site provides detailed evidence-based responses, making it excellent for scholarly opinions. Requires Puppeteer for full JavaScript content rendering.
